text: Under Fire is a 1957 American war drama movie directed by James B. Clark and starring Rex Reason, Harry Morgan, Steve Brodie, Peter Walker, Robert Levin, Jon Locke. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * Category:1957 war movies Category:1957 drama movies Category:American war movies Category:1950s American drama movies
title: Under Fire (1957 movie)
